title: Monsters, robots and nightmares: A UMass Lowell class brings the fright
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Frankenstein and Jurassic Park and robots, oh my! Professor Todd Avery joined Radio Boston to talk about what we can learn from famous sci-fi monsters.

media:content.media:description: British actor Boris Karloff is seen in his trademark role as the monster of Frankenstein in this 1947 photograph. (AP Photo)
